title: Machine Actionable Poster Extraction v1.0.0
description: A tool for extracting structured, machine-readable metadata from scientific conference posters using Llama 3.1 8B. The extraction pipeline processes PDF and image posters, outputting JSON-formatted metadata including titles, authors, affiliations, poster content sections, and figure/table captions.
notes: Validated on 10 manually annotated scientific posters with 90% passing rate. Average metrics: word_capture=0.964, ROUGE-L=0.880, number_capture=0.914, field_proportion=1.033.
